title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Next Frontier in Financial Systems: Transformer-based Foundation Models
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 金融系统的下一个前沿:基于Transformer的基础模型
abstract: Transformer-based foundation models are revolutionizing payment systems by providing deep contextual understanding of sequential transaction data. In this session, NVIDIA and AWS experts explain how large-scale tabular foundation models are trained and deployed to detect fraud in real time, personalize customer experiences, and interpret complex transaction patterns. Attendees will learn about the cloud-based AI factories enabling scalable deployment, NVIDIA’s accelerated computing for efficient training and tuning, and AWS’s secure and scalable cloud infrastructure. This presentation is brought to you by NVIDIA, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 基于Transformer的基础模型正在通过对序列交易数据提供深度上下文理解来革新支付系统。在本次会议中，NVIDIA和AWS专家将解释如何训练和部署大规模表格基础模型，以实时检测欺诈、个性化客户体验并解释复杂的交易模式。与会者将了解支持可扩展部署的基于云的AI工厂、NVIDIA用于高效训练和调优的加速计算，以及AWS安全且可扩展的云基础设施。本演示由AWS合作伙伴NVIDIA提供。

presenter.name: Pahal Patangia
presenter.title: Head of Global Industry Business Development, Payments
